## Conditions.ConditionTokens.findQualifierForValue() method

Given a value and a set of qualifiers, finds a single token-optional qualifier that matches the value. Fails if no qualifiers match, or if more than one qualifier matches.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static findQualifierForValue(value: string, qualifiers: IReadOnlyQualifierCollector): Result<Qualifier>;
```

</th><th>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

qualifiers


</td><td>

[IReadOnlyQualifierCollector](./ts-res.qualifiers.ireadonlyqualifiercollector.md)


</td><td>

the qualifiers to match against.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[Qualifier](./ts-res.qualifiers.qualifier.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the matching qualifier if successful, `Failure` with an error message if not.
